title: Mr. Strong: Good Thing I Came Along (1)
description: The classic children’s characters are taking the graphic novel world by storm! Dillydale’s resident strong man is flexing some real muscle!Reads L to R (Western Style). Full-color pages.Good thing Mr. Strong came along! When Little Miss Whoops’s dog Biscuit gets loose, it’s up to Mr. Strong to bring her back, but it’s easier said than done! Our hero winds up on the high seas and flying through the air before his rescuing’s done. And in between, he takes time out to rescue a Western town, star in a play and get to the gym!
author: Michael Daedalus Kenny
